00039 void help() {
00040   cout << "socket-listener-demo - Basic program to listen for messages from engine." << endl;
00041   cout << endl;
00042   cout << "usage:" << endl;
00043   cout << "   socket-listener-demo port" << endl;
00044   exit(1);
00045 }
00046 
00047 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00048  
00049  SocketServer server;
00050  string host = "127.0.0.1";
00051  if (argc < 2) {
00052    help();
00053  }
00054  string port = argv[1];
00055  cout << "Trying to open socket on host: " << host <<  " on port: " << port << endl;
00056  server.socketOpen(host, port);
00057 // sleep(2);
00058  std::vector<std::string> messages;
00059  cout << "Entering loop" << endl;
00060  while(1) {
00061    if (!server.isConnected()) {
00062            cout << ".";
00063            cout.flush();
00064          }
00065    int numFound = server.acceptNewConnection();
00066    if (numFound > 0) {
00067      cout << "Found " << numFound << " new connections." << endl;
00068    }
00069    if (server.isConnected()) {
00070            server.checkForMsgs(messages);
00071            for(int i = 0; i < messages.size(); i++) {
00072           cout << messages[i];
00073           cout.flush();
00074        }
00075    }
00076 #ifdef WIN32
00077    Sleep(100);
00078 #else
00079    sleep(1);
00080 #endif
00081  }
00082  return 0;
00083 }
